subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Danny Jordaan acknowledged that South Africa had paid out $10 million in 2008 but denied that the money had been in any way a bribe to FIFA.
snippet: Danny Jordaan acknowledged that South Africa had paid out $10 million in 2008 but denied that the money had been in any way a bribe to FIFA.
